name: ColourPop Silky Powder Blush - Long-Wear Blush for Cheeks with Medium-Buildable Coverage - Leaves Skin with a Soft, Matte Finish - Cupid's Bow (0.16 oz)
short_description: Rich, Colorful Flush - A rich, soft matte blush that glides on smoothly and leaves cheeks with a natural and healthy flush. Perfectly packaged in a small heart, so you can take your blush on-the-go and where everywhere your heart desires.
Why You'll Love It - Made with a finely-milled formula, this powdered blush contains silky powders that adhere to the skin, providing long wear and color that stays true all day.
Why You Need It - Our soft blush powder blends evenly into your skin and can be layered to your desired intensity. Pair with our Super Shock Highlighter Makeup for a unique, glistening glow.
Application Tips - Wear the blush makeup alone or layer for more dimension. For a rosy-cheeked look, start at the apples of the cheek and blend upwards. Use with your favorite blush brush.
Obsession-Worthy Beauty - We believe beauty should be fun, fearless, and accessible. That’s why we serve up trend-setting, cruelty-free formulas made for real life.
product_description: Elevate your face makeup routine with ColourPop Silky Powder Blush, the ultimate makeup blush designed to give your cheeks a natural blush that lasts all day. This finely-milled face blush is silky smooth, blendable, and buildable, making it perfect for any makeup style—from an everyday flush to a bold pop of color. Available in a wide variety of shades, including pink blush, red blush, peach blush, and shimmer blush, this pressed blush makeup ensures you can customize your perfect look. The lightweight formula adheres effortlessly to the skin, providing long-lasting, true-to-color pigment that won’t fade throughout the day. Whether you love a soft glow or a dramatic cheek, this blush layers beautifully for a customizable finish. Pair it with your favorite bronzer, highlighter, and setting powder to complete your look, and enjoy the adorable heart-shaped compact that makes this blush as cute as it is functional. Perfect for makeup lovers, beauty enthusiasts, and anyone looking for a high-quality, long-wearing face blush.

name: e.l.f. Blush, Long-Lasting Blush For Creating A Natural, Healthy Glow, Flatters Your Skin Tone, Vegan & Cruelty-Free
short_description: BLUSH FOR A NATURAL GLOW: This blush enhances your natural, healthy glow and can be used to complement any makeup look.
LONG-LASTING FORMULA: Formulated to create lasting color that accentuates your features and flatters your skin tone.
HOW TO USE: Apply powder to apples of the cheeks or any other areas you wish to highlight using the e.l.f. blush brush.
VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE: e.l.f. stands with every eye, lip, face, paw and fin. Proudly vegan, e.l.f. is double-certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny & PETA.

name: Milani Rose Blush, Powder Blush for Cheeks, Cruelty Free Makeup - Shape, Contour & Highlight Face for a Natural Matte Finish -Wild Rose
short_description: PETAL-PERFECT BLUSH: A blush that deserves to be seen, Rose Powder Blush is gorgeous in the compact and even prettier on cheeks. This is one petal-perfect beauty that you'll reach for again and again.
AVAILABLE IN 6 SHADES: Choose from 6 different matte or shimmery pretty pink shades to contour your face and add a natural rosiness to your cheeks.
CRUELTY-FREE BEAUTY: The natural-finish powder is formulated to softly shape, contour and highlight with flattering shades that complement every skin tone. Never tested on animals.

TIPS & TRICKS: Apply with the included mini brush or Milani Blush Brush starting at the apple of your cheek and gently swiping up and away. The buildable formula enables you to create a natural or more rosy look.

WE ARE MILANI: Born in East LA, we've always been connected to the rich diversity of our neighborhood, because it’s a place that truly embodies the melting pot of Los Angeles. We're not inspired by couture and top models. Our passion is real people, living real lives. Beauty is for everyone. No matter who you are or where you come from, we're here to fuel your self-expression with makeup for every shade, attitude, and ethnicity. No judgment. No exceptions.

name: Physicians Formula Powder Palette Multi-Colored Blush, Silky Smooth Formula, Hypoallergenic, Blends Easily Without Irritation – Blushing Rose
short_description: PRESSED POWDER BLUSH MAKEUP: This multi-colored blush palette is a perfect blend of complimentary hues to accentuate & enhance cheekbones, for a fresh, healthy natural-looking flush. Just swirl the brush to pick up a blend of the mosaic of blush shades.

PHYSICIANS FORMULA BLUSH COMPACT: Sweep on with a kabuki brush or blush brush, alone or over makeup, to enhance skin tone and correct imperfections. Blend of colors in pallet provides a soft, dimensional natural finish without a monochrome cast.

PUT YOUR BEST FACE FORWARD: From primers to highlighters, we offer a full face of makeup to help you build a foundation for any look, and all without irritating ingredients or harsh additives. Just long-wearing, lushly pigmented, quality cosmetics.

Physician's Formula offers a full line of skin care and makeup for sensitive skin, including mascaras, lipsticks, concealers, eyeliners, eyeshadow palettes, bb creams, bronzers & primers. Our products are hypoallergenic & safe for sensitive skin and eyes.

PHYSICIANS FORMULA IS INCOMPARABLE: Try Physician's Formula cosmetics and skin care if you've liked products from Clinique, elf, Almay, Neutrogena, Maybelline, L'Oréal, Laura Mercier, Estee Lauder, Kylie Cosmetics, NYX.
product_description: Powder Palette Multi-Colored BlushDescription * A beautiful mosaic of complementary hues to contour and accentuate cheekbones with soft color and discreet shimmer. * It's the perfect combination of colors that blend together to naturally enhance your cheekbones. * The finest Italian talc provides a silky-smooth application that blends easily without streaking or irritating sensitive skin. Hypoallergenic. Fragrance-free. Dermatologist approved. Oil-free.

name: LAURA GELLER NEW YORK Baked Blush-n-Brighten Marbleized Blush for Cheeks - Pink Buttercream - Natural Finish - Buildable Color
short_description: BAKED BLUSH-N-BRIGHTEN MARBELIZED BLUSH: Get an instant flush of color with a hint of radiance from this marbleized blush with a creamy texture and weightless feel. Handmade in Italy, the award-winning formula self-adjusts to your skin tone and is enriched with antioxidants, so your healthy glow is actually healthy for your skin from the inside out.
PINK BUTTERCREAM: Raspberry, bronze and neutral pink, for medium skin tones. Natural Finish.

INFUSED WITH ANTOXIDANTS: With this blush, your rosy glow comes with healthier skin in the long-term. The formula is infused with antioxidants Centella Asiatica and White Tea Extracts, for a burst of skincare-inspired ingredients every time you use it.
PERFECT FOR: Instantly wake up mature and dull skin. This luminous blush adds a hint of highlight with a weightless finish, perfect for all skin types.
HOW TO APPLY: Using a blush brush, apply the blush on the apples of your cheeks, blending up towards the hairline.

name: 3 Color Matte Pink Blush Palette with Brush, Long Lasting Cheek Makeup, Light and Smooth Blush Powder for Face Beauty
short_description: Versatile and Lightweight: This blush palette comes with a complimentary blush brush, offering a lightweight and buildable application. It provides natural, all-day color and allows for a range of makeup looks, from subtle to dramatic, ensuring an even and glowing finish.

Diverse Shades: The palette features three shades with satin and matte finishes, ideal for crafting various makeup styles. The inclusion of the blush brush facilitates a flawless application, delivering a natural matte look to the complexion.

Ultra-Soft Formula: Enhanced with a velvet powder formula, the blush glides on smoothly and blends seamlessly. The provided brush helps apply the blush evenly, creating a sophisticated, natural look without excess powder.

Universal Appeal: Suitable for all skin tones, this palette and its versatile brush allow for color mixing to cater to individual preferences. It's a product with universal appeal, perfect for users of all ages.

Multifunctional Beauty Tool: The highly pigmented blush, used with the included brush, can be applied to the cheeks for a flushed appearance. Beyond serving as a blush, the palette doubles as an eyeshadow, making it a versatile addition to any beauty collection.
